title: 15 English Roll Arm Sofas That Will Instantly Elevate Your Living Room
description: The English roll arm sofa might just be the accent your living room is missing. READ MORE...
author: Sarah M. Vazquez
excerpt: When it comes to designing your living space, the sofa you choose might just be the most important decor element of them all. From trendy velvet picks to cozy deep models, sofas have the power to be the statement-making piece that pulls the whole room together. So, may we suggest the English arm roll sofa for a couch that combines extreme comfort with a unique, eye-catching design? Now, you may be asking yourself, “What exactly is an English roll arm sofa?

My work's been published by Hearst, PureWow, and Bauer Media Group. I'm a Brooklyn-born Jersey Girl (with a BA in English from Montclair State University) who loves a good playlist, a good bagel, and my family (but not necessarily in that order).Haley LyndesHaley LyndesCommerce SEO WriterI'm the SEO writer for both Apartment Therapy and The Kitchn. My work has been featured in BuzzFeed, PopSugar, Travel + Leisure, and other publications. updated nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.When it comes to designing your living space, the sofa you choose might just be the most important decor element of them all. From trendy velvet picks to cozy deep models, sofas have the power to be the statement-making piece that pulls the whole room together. So, may we suggest the English arm roll sofa for a couch that combines extreme comfort with a unique, eye-catching design? What Is an English Roll Arm Sofa?Now, you may be asking yourself, “What exactly is an English roll arm sofa?” While the name might be foreign at first, one glimpse and you’re sure to recognize these stunners. That being said, let’s break down some defining characteristics of the English roll arm sofa: Sloped arms: The first and possibly most defining characteristic of an English roll arm sofa is its sloped arms. Unlike other sofas with sloped arms, these feature a gentle curve and extremely low-profile design (perfect for resting your head!) alongside some occasional ruching for an extra touch of elegance. Statement legs: The second standout feature would be the legs. English arm roll sofas typically always feature some sort of statement leg, whether it be something like a gorgeous turned style or a rolling caster style. However, many modern picks also lean on tapered and block-style legs. Additional curved accents: Alongside the curve of the armrests, you’ll typically find additional curved accents on these sofas, including a possible rounded back, curved cushions, or a curved bottom frame that mimics the arms. Deep seating: The last thing you’ll want to know about these sofas is that they usually feature deep seating, so be sure you take into account your space before deciding on one of these sofas. The Best English Arm Rolls Sofas Best Overall: Walters Upholstered Sofa — If you want quality, customization, and classic design, this is our pick for you. Best Budget: Ashley Bralynn Sofa — A gorgeous piece doesn’t have to cost a fortune, so for those looking for an English arm roll sofa on a budget, we’re loving this Ashley find. Best Splurge: Interior Define Rose Fabric Sofa — This sofa is definitely an investment, but it’s money well spent with its quality build, materials, and customization process. Plus, with the modern take on a classic, it’s sure to be a piece we’re sure you’ll love for decades to come. Ready to add one to your space? We scoured the web on our hunt to find the best of the best and came up with 15 options that perfectly capture the beauty of the English roll arm sofa. So turn on your electric tea kettle (or pour yourself a pint, we won’t judge), and get ready to transform your living room with one of the best English arm roll sofas out there. You’ll be living it up in the London-style flat of your dreams in no time. Do you have an English arm roll sofa you love? We want to hear all about it! Tell us about your favorite finds in the comments below.1 / 15Birch Lane$1599.00was $1799.00Looking for an uber-customizable English arm roll sofa? Available in more than 82 color options, the Walters sofa is perfect for anyone looking to curate a space to their specific color palette. Top it off with a hardwood frame, blended down-filled cushions, and turned legs, and you'll find this an exceptionally elegant pick.2 / 15Ashley$849.99For a budget- and small-space-friendly option, check out Ashley's Bralynn loveseat, which looks timeless in its simple linen upholstery. Its cream finish will blend with various decor styles, while its deep seats provide plenty of lounging space. Moreover, it doesn't dip or sag so you can have it for years. 3 / 15Interior Define$2145.00Interior Define is the place to go for stylish, customizable seating, and the Rose Fabric Sofa is the perfect choice for those looking for an English arm roll pick. Available in dozens of colors and fabrics, you can also choose between two cushion styles. Its three front-facing rolling caster feet are another small but eye-catching detail that sets this couch apart. Those, combined with the sofa's curved lines, make it an old-world masterpiece that you can put your personal stamp on.5 / 15Anthropologie$1548.00To say this sofa from Anthropologie is a stunner would be an understatement. Available in an array of bold colors (in both velvet and linen finishes), this sofa's channel-tufted back and walnut, turned legs immediately draw the eye for a look that is both refined and relaxed. 6 / 15Lulu and Georgia$3598.00The Rivington Sofa is so versatile, it'll fit into any room in your home. With its soft, sink-in cushions and traditional silhouette, it’s just as great for laid-back lounging as it is for a more polished look. And the best part? You can customize it with a variety of fabrics — think plush velvet, textured bouclé, crisp linen, and more! 7 / 15Wayfair$3399.00was $3599.00Out of all of Wayfair’s online picks (and if you shop there, you know there are plenty), the Birch Lane Sullivan Upholstered Sofa stands out. Available in 38 fabrics and three leg colors, it features three front-facing bun feet— a small but eye-catching detail that adds character. Combined with its curved lines, this sofa is an old-world masterpiece with timeless appeal! 8 / 15Pottery Barn$1499.00If your budget has a little more wiggle room, the Carlisle Sofa is another customizable pick that we adore from Pottery Barn. Coming in three width sizes and an array of colors and fabrics, this sofa is as classic as it comes. One of our favorite features? You can select multi-cushion or bench seating for a look that's all your own.9 / 15Serena & Lily$4998.00Choose to keep it simple or take it up a notch with all the customizations the Miramar Sofa offers. Available in a whopping 184 fabric options, three different sizes, and four leg colors, this sofa will be uniquely yours. Crafted with the highest-quality materials, it's built to last a lifetime with proper care. We love this stripe version for its unique look!10 / 15McGee & Co$8664.00If you're looking for the perfect blend of style and comfort, try the Hildegard Soda. The modern take on the English arm rolls, along with the camelback design, give this classic an update you'll love, while the cushy single-seat cushion is perfect for kicking your feet up. It's built tough with a solid alder frame, so it's ready for countless movie nights and afternoon naps.11 / 15Wayfair$889.99was $1049.99The five-star reviews of the Somerville sofa speak for themselves, and one thing is very clear: This is one comfortable sofa. With a premium spring system that provides a deeper and more comfortable seat and "Wow Seating" cushions that offer the right amount of softness and sink, this solid-wood-framed sofa is a pillowy dream. 12 / 15One Kings Lane$5106.50was $7295.00For those in the market for a sectional, we loved this pick from One Kings Lane. Perched on exposed wood legs (in a gorgeous chestnut finish), this velvet sofa is made with extreme comfort in mind. The back cushions are filled with a feather/down blend, while the seat cushions remain sturdy and supportive thanks to individually pocketed coils encased in foam (which are then wrapped in that same feather/down blend).13 / 15Williams Sonoma$3495.00There's something incredibly timeless about the look of a crisp, white sofa. Handcrafted in the USA, the Bedford sofa features an eco-friendly cushion core, down cushions, and turned front legs set on a pair of stylish casters. And if white's not your speed, don't worry; it comes in a variety of colors in a selection of fabrics and premium leathers.14 / 15One Kings Lane$2586.50was $3695.00If there's one trend we hope doesn't go away anytime soon, it's the velvet sofa. For a velvet take on the English arm roll sofa, the Hayes Sofa from One Kings Lane is a beautiful choice. Elegant and down-filled for superior comfort, this sofa also features two caster front legs for easy mobility, giving your floors the break they deserve.15 / 15McGee & Co$8894.00Yes, English roll arm sectionals exist, and the Lucille Sectional from Lulu and Georgia is a perfect example. Not only is its design stunning, but it also showcases all the timeless attributes of a traditional roll arm sofa. With deep seating, plush cushions, and six fabric options, it’s easy to find the perfect fit for your space.

When it comes to designing your living space, the sofa you choose might just be the most important decor element of them all. From trendy velvet picks to cozy deep models, sofas have the power to be the statement-making piece that pulls the whole room together. So, may we suggest the English arm roll sofa for a couch that combines extreme comfort with a unique, eye-catching design?

What Is an English Roll Arm Sofa?

Now, you may be asking yourself, “What exactly is an English roll arm sofa?” While the name might be foreign at first, one glimpse and you’re sure to recognize these stunners. That being said, let’s break down some defining characteristics of the English roll arm sofa:

  • Sloped arms: The first and possibly most defining characteristic of an English roll arm sofa is its sloped arms. Unlike other sofas with sloped arms, these feature a gentle curve and extremely low-profile design (perfect for resting your head!) alongside some occasional ruching for an extra touch of elegance.
  • Statement legs: The second standout feature would be the legs. English arm roll sofas typically always feature some sort of statement leg, whether it be something like a gorgeous turned style or a rolling caster style. However, many modern picks also lean on tapered and block-style legs.
  • Additional curved accents: Alongside the curve of the armrests, you’ll typically find additional curved accents on these sofas, including a possible rounded back, curved cushions, or a curved bottom frame that mimics the arms.
  • Deep seating: The last thing you’ll want to know about these sofas is that they usually feature deep seating, so be sure you take into account your space before deciding on one of these sofas.

The Best English Arm Rolls Sofas

  • Best Overall: Walters Upholstered Sofa — If you want quality, customization, and classic design, this is our pick for you.
  • Best Budget: Ashley Bralynn Sofa — A gorgeous piece doesn’t have to cost a fortune, so for those looking for an English arm roll sofa on a budget, we’re loving this Ashley find.
  • Best Splurge: Interior Define Rose Fabric Sofa — This sofa is definitely an investment, but it’s money well spent with its quality build, materials, and customization process. Plus, with the modern take on a classic, it’s sure to be a piece we’re sure you’ll love for decades to come.

Ready to add one to your space? We scoured the web on our hunt to find the best of the best and came up with 15 options that perfectly capture the beauty of the English roll arm sofa. So turn on your electric tea kettle (or pour yourself a pint, we won’t judge), and get ready to transform your living room with one of the best English arm roll sofas out there. You’ll be living it up in the London-style flat of your dreams in no time.

Do you have an English arm roll sofa you love? We want to hear all about it! Tell us about your favorite finds in the comments below.

1 / 15

Birch Lane

$1599.00

was $1799.00

Looking for an uber-customizable English arm roll sofa? Available in more than 82 color options, the Walters sofa is perfect for anyone looking to curate a space to their specific color palette. Top it off with a hardwood frame, blended down-filled cushions, and turned legs, and you'll find this an exceptionally elegant pick.

2 / 15

Ashley

$849.99

For a budget- and small-space-friendly option, check out Ashley's Bralynn loveseat, which looks timeless in its simple linen upholstery. Its cream finish will blend with various decor styles, while its deep seats provide plenty of lounging space. Moreover, it doesn't dip or sag so you can have it for years.

3 / 15

Interior Define

$2145.00

Interior Define is the place to go for stylish, customizable seating, and the Rose Fabric Sofa is the perfect choice for those looking for an English arm roll pick. Available in dozens of colors and fabrics, you can also choose between two cushion styles. Its three front-facing rolling caster feet are another small but eye-catching detail that sets this couch apart. Those, combined with the sofa's curved lines, make it an old-world masterpiece that you can put your personal stamp on.

5 / 15

Anthropologie

$1548.00

To say this sofa from Anthropologie is a stunner would be an understatement. Available in an array of bold colors (in both velvet and linen finishes), this sofa's channel-tufted back and walnut, turned legs immediately draw the eye for a look that is both refined and relaxed.

6 / 15

Lulu and Georgia

$3598.00

The Rivington Sofa is so versatile, it'll fit into any room in your home. With its soft, sink-in cushions and traditional silhouette, it’s just as great for laid-back lounging as it is for a more polished look. And the best part? You can customize it with a variety of fabrics — think plush velvet, textured bouclé, crisp linen, and more!

7 / 15

Wayfair

was $3599.00

Out of all of Wayfair’s online picks (and if you shop there, you know there are plenty), the Birch Lane Sullivan Upholstered Sofa stands out. Available in 38 fabrics and three leg colors, it features three front-facing bun feet— a small but eye-catching detail that adds character. Combined with its curved lines, this sofa is an old-world masterpiece with timeless appeal!

If your budget has a little more wiggle room, the Carlisle Sofa is another customizable pick that we adore from Pottery Barn. Coming in three width sizes and an array of colors and fabrics, this sofa is as classic as it comes. One of our favorite features? You can select multi-cushion or bench seating for a look that's all your own.

Choose to keep it simple or take it up a notch with all the customizations the Miramar Sofa offers. Available in a whopping 184 fabric options, three different sizes, and four leg colors, this sofa will be uniquely yours. Crafted with the highest-quality materials, it's built to last a lifetime with proper care. We love this stripe version for its unique look!

If you're looking for the perfect blend of style and comfort, try the Hildegard Soda. The modern take on the English arm rolls, along with the camelback design, give this classic an update you'll love, while the cushy single-seat cushion is perfect for kicking your feet up. It's built tough with a solid alder frame, so it's ready for countless movie nights and afternoon naps.

The back cushions are filled with a feather/down blend, while the seat cushions remain sturdy and supportive thanks to individually pocketed coils encased in foam (which are then wrapped in that same feather/down blend).

Handcrafted in the USA, the Bedford sofa features an eco-friendly cushion core, down cushions, and turned front legs set on a pair of stylish casters. And if white's not your speed, don't worry; it comes in a variety of colors in a selection of fabrics and premium leathers.

If there's one trend we hope doesn't go away anytime soon, it's the velvet sofa. For a velvet take on the English arm roll sofa, the Hayes Sofa from One Kings Lane is a beautiful choice. Elegant and down-filled for superior comfort, this sofa also features two caster front legs for easy mobility, giving your floors the break they deserve.

Yes, English roll arm sectionals exist, and the Lucille Sectional from Lulu and Georgia is a perfect example. Not only is its design stunning, but it also showcases all the timeless attributes of a traditional roll arm sofa. With deep seating, plush cushions, and six fabric options, it’s easy to find the perfect fit for your space.
